, you and Tenzen go find the 3����.It's somewhere in the communion hall.1�

Lady Prishe!?1�
<Sigh>Let us begin our search for this 3���� she speaks of.1�
She is such a demanding young lady. And I believed the imperious princesses of the Far East were hard on their subjects!1�
This appears to be some sort of storage room.Can the God of Twilight truly reside here...?�
Is this the Twilight God, Promathia...?1�
There you go.1�
But...But this is nothing more than a statue!1�
Uh-huh. It was found by some thieves with more curiosity than sense. Lots of people lost their lives before this was finally brought here.1�
I see. I have heard tell that the nation of Tavnazia had strong ties with pirates and other bandit groups.1�
The Tavnazian Cathedral used to buy up weird artifacts all the time to give its researchers something to study.1�
It all began as a search for the ��Paradise�� of legend.1�
You know, the place those ancient people tried to get to--the thing that ticked off Promathia so much.1�
It is said that the gods sleep in Paradise.1�
The former Tavnazian theologians thought they could go there and ask Altana to remove the curse of Promathia.1�
If the curse of war and conflict vanished from the world, we would no longer have to fear the threat of the beastmen.1�
But as things progressed, the aim of the cathedral's research shifted.1�
As they continued to investigate the objects left by the ancient people, the theologians realized that the older civilization was way more advanced than their own.1�
Even with their advanced culture, however, they were no match for Promathia. Their city was obliterated...1�
So this is what the elders of the Tavnazian Cathedral proposed:1�
What if they were to invite the Dawn Goddess to cross over into our world?1�
Invite the Goddess...!?1�
But before this incredible event was to happen, Cardinal Mildaurion arrived, and Tavnazia was destroyed not long after.1�
Anyway, I found out something that'd give Ulmia's granpere a heart attack.1�
You see that glowing stone stuck in there?If you stand here and do this, you can hear the voice of Promathia...�
Lady Prishe!?�
So this is the Tavnazian child known as the abhorrent one.1�
It seems she caused a terrible accident during the baptismal ceremony.1�
Many of the clergy lost their lives during the incident, and those who survived told of terrifying dreams of the cursed deity...1�
What truly proves this child's damnation is her ever youthful form.That, and the rumors of her ability to read people's minds...1�
Why does this new cardinal allow the child to walk freely after the cathedral had taken steps to ensure her eternal confinement?And why bring her here to San d'Oria...?1�
According to Cardinal Mildaurion, the birth of such a child is a sign that our most desperate wish is about to be granted.1�
I speak of the treasure entrusted to Tavnazia.1�
What generations of cardinals have hidden from in fear, this Mildaurion has chosen to reveal to the San d'Orian Cathedral.1�
If Tavnazia's treasure is brought together with the holy artifact we hold, the Gates of Paradise will not long remain closed...1�
Prishe, you are a child of destiny.1�
However, your part in this is over.There is nothing left within you...1�
